author: undetermined
full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML appears to be an error page from the Ministry of External Affairs, Government of India website, not an actual fact-check article. This is a standard "page not found" (404) error page with generic text about a missing webpage. 

The content consists of:
- An apology message
- A statement that the page doesn't exist or has moved
- Links to go back to the home page or provide feedback

There is no fact-check content to extract. If you intended to provide a fact-check HTML, could you please re-share the correct HTML content?
title:
University clarified that Sen has received “no salary whatsoever” The Nalanda University Act, 2010 states that “the Chancellor shall be appointed by the Visitor,” who is the President of India. Adding that the Vice-Chancellor will be the principal academic and executive officer and exercises control over the affairs of the University, giving effect to the decisions of all authorities. Rs. 2727.10 cr was actually the amount approved by govt for the establishment of the University. Manmohan Singh’s daughters were not associated with the University during Sen’s tenure. We were not independently able to verify other claims made in the post. Check the following links
https://nalandauniv.edu.in/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/act-n.pdf
https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/nalanda-university-refutes-swamys-charges-against-sen/article6934097.ece
vclaim: This is not a fact-check article but rather a 404 error page from the Ministry of External Affairs website indicating that the requested page could not be found.
